amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the Internal Revenue Service's Operations Support account by $165,300.00 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 195 printed in House Report 115-297 to reduce the Internal Revenue Service's Operations Support account by $165,300.00 and apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A161) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 223 (Roll no. 519).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Gohmert amendment (A161) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 223 (Roll no. 519).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A161) offered by Mr. Gohmert.
